title: Can not change Ringtone
content:
Phone is a Pixel 3 XL running Android version 9, build number PQ3A.190801.002

I can not change my ringtone Sound>Phone ringtone is stuck at '2458'.    Same with the Default notification sound, it can't be changed from '2460'.

Booting in Safe Mode does not help.

I messed around will Apps and deleted the 'Sounds' app which does not appear to be a good idea.  Now when I go to Settings>Sound and long tap 'Phone ringtone' I get the message 'Settings keeps stopping'.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device
